name: search_contacts
description: Search for a contact using a name or keyword.
parameters: {'search_query': 'What name or keyword would you like to search for?'}

name: open_navigation_drawer
description: Open the navigation drawer to access additional options or settings.

name: select_contact_group
description: Select a group of contacts to filter the contact list.
parameters: {'group_type': 'Which group do you want to select? [Phone contacts, Email contacts, Company]'}

name: view_contact_details
description: View details of a specific contact.
parameters: {'contact_name': 'Which contact do you want to view?'}

name: switch_tab
description: Switch to a different tab in the app.
parameters: {'tab_name': 'Which tab do you want to switch to? [Contacts, Highlights, Fix & manage]'}

name: show_more_options
description: Show more options for the current screen.

name: delete_contact
description: Delete a specific contact from the contact list.
parameters: {'contact_name': 'Which contact do you want to delete?'}

name: delete_contact
description: Delete a specific contact from the contact list.
parameters: {'contact_name': 'Which contact do you want to delete? [Tom]'}

name: mark_as_favorite
description: Mark a specific contact as a favorite.
parameters: {'contact_name': 'Which contact do you want to mark as a favorite?'}

name: return_to_home_screen
description: Return to the home screen of the device.
